**Government Tender Announcement: At-Sea Observers for Snow Crab Survey**

**Reference Number**: cb-7337-18269253
**Solicitation Number**: 30004419
**Publication Date**: 2023-07-18

**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-08-02T13:00:00

**Project Overview**

Fisheries and Oceans Canada is soliciting proposals for the provision of up to three (3) DFO-certified at-sea observers for an annual snow crab survey conducted on the Scotian shelf. The survey aims to assess the snow crab stock, which is a valuable fishery in Atlantic Canada. Top-quality data collection, entry, and editing are essential for this contract as the data is used to inform management decisions.

**Contract Requirements**

* Provide up to three (3) DFO-certified at-sea observers
* Provide data entry, data editing, and data loading into the DFO ISDB database
* Participate in the snow crab survey and provide biological measurements of the animals caught
* Sort catch at each survey station

**Specifications**

* The contractor must provide a minimum of four (4) scientific staff, including a chief scientist, a DFO aquatic sciences technician, and up to three (3) DFO-certified at-sea observers
* The contractor must also provide data entry, data editing, and data loading into the DFO ISDB database
* The contractor must ensure that all data is handled in accordance with DFO security policy

**Location**

The contract will be based in Nova Scotia, Canada, with activities taking place on the Scotian shelf.

**Tender Status**

This tender has expired.

**Attachments**

* [rfp-eng.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7337/30004419---rfp-eng.pdf)
* [rfp-fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7337/30004419---rfp-fr.pdf)

**Contact Information**

* Marie-Carmen Sedji
* marie-carmen.sedji@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
* (506) 478-7358
